title: Sim_card
author: Sim_card
content: I beg my pipu,I dey vex for the way things just dey scatter and inflation dey high everyday by day. Tinubu wey some people say na him dem want, say him go fit change things for the country to make am better,come join dey make am worst the more. Imagine three months never reach Baba remove fuel subsidy,remove education subsidy and still go apply for loan say him wan use am pay poor Nigerians 8k for 6 months. Yesterday,I dey watch news come discover say fuel wey them say no more subsidy price from 530 run reach 630,I ask myself say how come. This make me dey wonder say make I ask this question since na all of us dey the country together dey see as things don dey  go ever since. My question be say for Naija na who dey make things dey spoil the more,shey na our Nigeria police or Politicians or we the citizens. I beg give me your reason.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Dis Naija matter plenty and e long like epistle to talk about. We no know who to blame again, na ourselves ahbi the leaders wey we put for those positions to lead us? The matter just get as e be now like this. Na to just go meet prayers and make person find something to dey do and no relent for government work or any intervention for now if not you go just old without achieving anything for dis world. Dey say for good thing to come, one must have to pass through hardship, I just pray ours no go pass like dis before things go come begin better for us for Naija.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: If we start blaming anyone today, e no go fit finish. The whole things happening today is not the work of just one person but everyone. For inside the country, we get those wey want progress and those wey no want. E no fit be the police, because them too dey receive order, e no fit be the politicians because na people put them there. If you say make I blame anyone like dis so na we be d problem of this county. Nigerians we are the threat. I'm just tired of the country and with d way things are going, I see more people suffering. The worst part of it is we don't have strong christians. If to say we get better pastors and religious leaders for nija, them for don call God, come solve our problem but no. Them dey use Christianity take purse politics and fame.Well  My brother I no sure weather Dem go fit fix nija oo make we just dey manage am the way we see am

Na chuse dem chuse am oda wise e 4 no dey dia & n desperateness 2 mch. Dou no blame dose way vote am cuz any hw e be 4 competition, who dey contest go stil gt 1 or 2 pipo to vote am.D main tin b say him dey lead us all so anytin we face, d comon pipo  2 way get trust in am say e go do well go stil face dsame tin with evry odas.As 4 comotin d fuel subsidy, him BAT don alredy tok am sins him campaign say nomata hw we protest say dem go stil remov subsidy. Is like dat 1 na n num.1 aim cus na same day dem do handova him comot subsidy  afta earlier sound warming den.Com to who dey responsible on d way tins dey go, my felo, e no dey we d masses hand, e no dey military or paramilitary hand, nobody hand oda dan d politicians/govtIf d govt bring, keep maintain and activate laws way go guide us with active system way go exacise  equal abidment,  d contry go beta.& d oly way d govt go meet up with a better economy na if dem stand to compit wit oda advans & betqa economic grot contries & if dem win, make dem compit a higher 1.D govt jst be like dem dey ok settling with less.D trut be say, dis so govt dey feed on public funds & d right constitution giv d masses na fake. E no dey work if not dem suposedey hia pipo criesDiz pipo really don sell dia conscience to Zero Conscience on the masses.Insecurities mata dey do us, inflations dey do us, No quality education & huspitalities.0 shameless govt we gt 4 9ja

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: To me na everybody be the problem, both police, Politicians and we wey be citizens, the day wey tinubu do en swearing it into office as president, the man made a statement say subsidy will be removed, en never even implement am that time sef, fuel stations start to increase the price of fuel then, and this fuel was their old stock oo.People wey do road transport Dem kuku increase the price of transportation, people wey even still dey use their old fuel wey Dem been buy when the price never increase still follow increase price for transportation, and anytime wey price of transportation increase for Nigeria because of the cost of fuel, even if the cost of fuel come down, the price of transportation no go come down again.Okay see as the fuel price increase from 530 to 617, plenty fuel stations for my side here wey get old stock( fuel) no gree sale again oo, Dem close their stations, Dem dey wait make the 617 circulate everywhere then Dem go come dey sale their old fuel wey suppose be 530 for 617, in order to make more profit.Is that one not wickedness?If government and police no dey reason and help us, we wey be citizens suppose reason and help ourselves, but we dey follow dey show ourselves wickedness, and e no good

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: The kind of hardship wey d for our country peso no fit talk how em go take escape am. Even the rich and the poor don see weehnnn for the country. Everybody the feel am, even those wey voted for Tinubu and those wey no vote for am the feel the high cost of things. Would I say, we don pass the first stage wey be shege for fuel price of 530naira, we don enter another level wey be shege banza for fuel price of 630naira, peso no know another level wey em go enter again for this country. Whether na 1000naira for fuel price. Em do become a norm sae, every new week na em peso the receive disheartening news for this country wey no go favor am but to  increase more  hardship give am. The question of whom to blame for this our matter no go be here to give answers to, because all of us the guilty of how our country don spoil reach.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: Sim_card on July 19, 2023, 12:07:36 PMI beg my pipu,I dey vex for the way things just dey scatter and inflation dey high everyday by day. My question be say for Naija na who dey make things dey spoil the more,shey na our Nigeria police or Politicians or we the citizens. I beg give me your reason.The problem of our country is multidimensional, it ranges from class war, political, ethnic, religious and other intra complex issues.A lot of people argue that, this are some of the issues faced with a Developing Democracy, but ours is Fused with lots of sentiment and revengeful bitterness.A country must have thinkers and idealist at the helm of affairs to steer the wheels of Development.First, our leaders should be discussing about housing schemes affordable for people to live, a water system in our houses, affordable healthcare services, electricity and food security. Once the above mentioned is reached, things will begin to fall into place, hence the institution's will begin to get strong, ranging from the judiciary, the police, the civil service etc.But then, if our political class are not discussing these, and they are hell bent in just occupying political offices without purpose, then we all begin to suffer the effect of hyper inflation, insecurity and other social vices like we are currently experiencing. It's a long ride we've entered.

comments.body: When it comes to Nigeria problem, the government should be held responsible, do you know that after the second upward review of pms in Nigeria, so many private depot's and filling stations, have been selling the product lower than the  so called NNPC approved price, this has been happening uptil this moment, that's to say that, there is a foul play somewhere that needs to be checked, the government controls everything so if their are new policies or price inflation, there are agencies and commissions that are assigned to to function in that capacity.Our leaders are not sincere to us, so it is high time they begin to accept responsibilities as they are, the country will only work, when all the arms of government comes in synergy and function according to the constitution of the country.
